fields.label: Form Mode
fields.name: form_mode
fields.instructions: Choose the style of the Form.

fields.label: Custom ID
fields.name: form_custom_id
fields.instructions:
Assigning an ID to this section, you can use it to create an anchor link.
Read more.

fields.label: Custom Class
fields.name: form_custom_class
fields.instructions: Enter a Class if you want to create Custom CSS.

fields.label: Enable on Front Page
fields.name: enable_form_on_front_page
fields.instructions: Enable so that this section appears only on the front page.

fields.label: Enable on Pages
fields.name: enable_form_on_pages
fields.instructions: Please enable this section to appear on all pages.

fields.label: Enable on Posts
fields.name: enable_form_on_posts
fields.instructions: Please enable this section to appear on all post pages.

fields.label: Enable Divider
fields.name: form_enable_separator_line
fields.instructions: Enable this option for a dash to be displayed below the section.

fields.label: Enable Dark Mode
fields.name: form_enable_dark_mode
fields.instructions: Enable this option if the background color of this section is dark. This will make the texts white.

fields.label: Background Color
fields.name: form_background_color
fields.instructions: That color will be applied to this section.

fields.label: Container
fields.name: form_container
fields.instructions: Choose the width of the Container in this section.

fields.label: Vertical Spacing
fields.name: form_vertical_spacing
fields.instructions: Choose the Vertical Spacing of this section in the Desktop Version. (Screens larger than 768px).

fields.label: Vertical Spacing < 768px
fields.name: form_vertical_spacing_responsive
fields.instructions: Choose the Vertical Spacing of this section in the Mobile Version. (Screens smaller than 768px).

fields.label: Sending Options
fields.name: form_sending_options
fields.instructions: Choose where subscriber data should be sent to.

fields.label: Email Recipient
fields.name: form_email_recipient
fields.instructions: For multiples emails, type them separated by commas.

fields.label: Webhook URL
fields.name: form_webhook_url
fields.instructions: The webhook option is recommended for integrations.

fields.label: Success Message
fields.name: form_success_message
fields.instructions: The message will be displayed when the form submission is successful.
fields.default_value: Your message was sent successful. Thanks.

fields.label: Validation Message
fields.name: form_validation_message
fields.instructions: The message will be displayed when validation errors occur on the form.
fields.default_value: Validation errors occurred. Please confirm the fields and submit it again.

fields.label: Error  Message
fields.name: form_error_message
fields.instructions: The message will be displayed when the server is unavailable or there is a technical problem.
fields.default_value: Sorry. We were unable to send your message.

fields.label: Heading Style
fields.name: simple_form_heading_style
fields.instructions: Choose the style of the Title for this section.

fields.label: Description
fields.name: simple_form_description
fields.instructions: Create a description that will be positioned below the Title.

fields.label: Button Label
fields.name: simple_form_button_label
fields.instructions: Enter the Label of the form button.

fields.label: Fields
fields.name: simple_form_fields
fields.instructions: Add the fields that will be requested in this form. Remember to add an email type field.

sub_fields.label: Info Option
sub_fields.name: info_option
sub_fields.instructions: This text will be at the top of the Select Field.

sub_fields.name: field
sub_fields.instructions: Enter each choice on a new line.

fields.label: Redirect to a URL?
fields.name: enable_form_redirect
fields.instructions: Redirect the visitor to a thank you page.

fields.label: Loading Text
fields.name: form_loading_text
fields.instructions: Text that is displayed when the form is being sent.

fields.label: Success Message
fields.name: success_message
fields.instructions: Type a thank you message.
fields.default_value: Your message was sent successful. Thanks.

fields.label: Success Image
fields.name: success_image
fields.instructions: Choose an image that will appear when the form submission is complete.

fields.label: Steps
fields.name: steps
fields.instructions: Here you can add up to 3 steps for the form. Remember to add an email type field in the first step. Read more.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: step_image
sub_fields.instructions: Each step needs an image that is positioned to the right of the form.

sub_fields.label: Heading Style
sub_fields.name: heading_style
sub_fields.instructions: Choose the style of the Title for this step.

sub_fields.label: Description
sub_fields.name: step_description
sub_fields.instructions: Create a description that will be positioned below the Title.
sub_fields.default_value: Fill out the form below and we will contact you as soon as possible.

sub_fields.label: Fields
sub_fields.name: step_fields
sub_fields.instructions: Add the fields that will be requested in this step.

sub_fields.label: Info Option
sub_fields.name: info_option
sub_fields.instructions: This text will be at the top of the Select Field.

sub_fields.name: field
sub_fields.instructions: Enter each choice on a new line.

sub_fields.label: Text
sub_fields.name: text
sub_fields.default_value: I have read and agree with the terms of use.
